REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1318 reute u f BC-PRIME-COMPUTER-<PRM> 04-13 0050

TEXT.TITLE: PRIME COMPUTER <PRM> TO INTRODUCE NEW MACHINES
TEXT.BODY: Prime Computer Inc said tomorrow it will introduce two new high-end superminicomputers. The company said the machines will significantly expand the performance of its 50 Series product line. It gave no further details. Reuter
